products.title: Palate Mediterranean Purple Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Woven Plum Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Woven plum roller blind.
